title: Colour today
brief_description: An account of the properties of colors and their use in decoration, advertising and other spheres of everyday life. Functional use of color in office, factory, and domestic equipment is discussed, and sequences show how color and design combined bring attractiveness to manufactured goods including bicycles, sewing machines and typewriters.
